summary: Comprehensive testing of FixItNow Marketplace completed. CRITICAL ISSUE CONFIRMED: Pro registration white page issue due to routing error. Backend APIs are 87.5% functional (14/16 tests passed). Marketing website and Customer app are 100% functional. Admin dashboard is working. The Pro app has a critical routing bug causing white page after registration.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns empty array instead of expected payment packages dictionary
critical_bugs.impact: CRITICAL - Buy Credits page cannot display package options, blocking Pro payments

minor_bugs.issue: Missing payment method fields: enable_stripe, enable_cashapp

critical_bugs.issue: WHITE PAGE after registration - routing error to '/register' instead of '/pro/register'
critical_bugs.impact: CRITICAL - Pro users cannot complete registration, see white page
critical_bugs.technical_details: Console error: 'No routes matched location "/register"' - Pro app tries to navigate to /register but route doesn't exist in AppPro.js

integration_issues.issue: Payment packages not displaying due to backend API returning empty array

passed_tests: Marketing Website - Professional landing page loads with all sections and navigation
Customer Registration - Successfully creates accounts and redirects to dashboard
Customer Login - Authentication working with proper session management
Customer Dashboard - Displays personalized welcome, stats, and action cards
Customer Post Job - Complete job posting workflow functional
Customer Browse Pros - Professional search and filtering working
Admin Login - Authentication successful with provided credentials
Admin Dashboard - Loads with analytics, user stats, and management cards
Admin Analytics - All dashboard metrics displaying correctly
Admin Users Management - User listing and management functional
Admin Categories Management - Service category management working
Admin Payment Packages Management - Database packages accessible
Backend Pro Registration - API creates pro accounts and profiles correctly
Backend Pro Login - Pro authentication working
Backend Pro Browse Jobs - Job listing API functional
Backend Pro Submit Quote - Quote submission with $10 budget deduction working
Backend Stripe Integration - Checkout session creation successful
Backend Service Categories - All 10 categories loading correctly

success_percentage.frontend_pro: 0% (CRITICAL: White page issue blocks all Pro functionality)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL FIXES REQUIRED: 1) Fix Pro registration routing - change navigation from '/register' to '/pro/register' in Pro app. 2) Fix /api/payments/packages endpoint to return packages dictionary instead of empty array. 3) Add missing payment method fields to admin settings endpoint. The Pro registration white page issue is confirmed and must be fixed immediately as it blocks all Pro user onboarding.
